sections.heading: to 17a-411. - Transferred to Chapter 319l, Part V, Secs. 17a-870 to 17a-876, inclusive.
sections.text: to 17a-411. - Transferred to Chapter 319l, Part V, Secs. 17a-870 to 17a-876, inclusive.

sections.heading: (Formerly Sec. 17b-407). - Report of suspected abuse, neglect, exploitation or abandonment
sections.text: Penalty for failure to report. Confidentiality. Immunity and protection from retaliation. Notification, training requirements.

sections.heading: (Formerly Sec. 17b-408). - Review of report or complaint
sections.text: Investigation. Report of findings. Referral of report, complaint or information for further action.

sections.heading: to 17a-422. - Transferred to Chapter 319l, Part V, Secs. 17a-877 to 17a-885, inclusive.
sections.text: to 17a-422. - Transferred to Chapter 319l, Part V, Secs. 17a-877 to 17a-885, inclusive.

sections.heading: Long-term care policy, regulation, task force membership requirements
sections.text: Duties of state agencies, Ombudsman, Commission on Women, Children, Seniors, Equity and Opportunity.

sections.heading: to 17a-441. - Transferred to Chapter 319dd, Secs. 17b-450 to 17b-461, inclusive.
